basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Cheryl Myers Endowed Scholarship for Interior Design
basic_information.college_name: College of Fine Arts and Design

description: This scholarship was established in 2012 by Tom and Judy Love in honor of Dr. Cheryl Myers, former program director of the interior design division at the University of Central Oklahoma. Eligibility Interior Design major Cumulative GPA 2.5+ Junior or Senior Requirements Personal artist statement (250 words) Official transcript

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

criteria.description: SIS_Major_2 is Design-Interior Design   or SIS_Major_2 is Interior Design   or SIS_Major is Design-Interior Design   or SIS_Major is Interior Design   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Design-Interior Design   or SIS_Major_1_2 is Interior Design   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Design-Interior Design   or SIS_Major_2_2 is Interior Design
